WorkPlace.Name: JKS a/s, Vejen
WorkPlace.Description: JKS er Danmarks største vikar- og rekrutteringsbureau med filialer over hele landet og 20 års erfaring. Vi har et indgående kendskab til lokalområdet, hvilket er en forudsætning for at finde spændende opgaver til vores medarbejdere. Desuden lægger vi vægt på, at der er styr på instruktion, udstyr m.v. - og at lønnen udbetales korrekt og til tiden. Hos JKS tilbyder vi vikariater af kortere og længere varighed, Try & Hire-forløb, projektansættelser samt rekruttering til fastansættelse.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Are you looking for a warehouse job in Aarhus?
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We’re looking for engaged and flexible warehouse employees. You must be stable and able to meet on time and take responsibility for your own work. You communicate in English in our multicultural warehouse, which means English is the main language.

There are different departments, so we are searching for different profiles. Most of the work will be packing goods and products. It’s a physical work as the work tasks can be lifting and sorting pallets and packages.



About you:

  • You can work part time or full time
  • You thrive with routine determined job tasks.
  • You can communicate in English.
  • You are ready for physical work.


We can offer you:

  • Morning or evening shifts
  • A good working environment and good colleagues
  • Payment of salary every two weeks
  • flexible work and working hours


If you’re Interested you can apply here or send us an email to salling@jks.dk with the word "Salling" in the headline.

We’re looking for engaged and flexible warehouse employees. You must be stable and able to meet on time and take responsibility for your own work. You communicate in English in our multicultural warehouse, which means English is the main language.

There are different departments, so we are searching for different profiles. Most of the work will be packing goods and products. It’s a physical work as the work tasks can be lifting and sorting pallets and packages.



About you:

  • You can work part time or full time
  • You thrive with routine determined job tasks.
  • You can communicate in English.
  • You are ready for physical work.


We can offer you:

  • Morning or evening shifts

If you’re Interested you can apply here or send us an email to salling@jks.dk with the word "Salling" in the headline.
